entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 23 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Temperature falling to minus 23 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023
